Class: EDL

EDL~ EDL

new EDL(config)

Represents an EDL Object.

Represents an EDL Object.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
config Object

EDL video sequence as JSON

Properties
Name Type Description
title string

Title of the EDL video sequence
offset string

The camera timecode, eg free run, rec run, time of day, repsent a time offset from the time relative to the beginning of the video file timeline. in format of timecode eg "00:00:28:08" such as "hh:mm:ss:ms" because that's how cameras write it in the metadata of the file. if it is "NA" then it uses default 0.
events Array.<Object>

array of video segment makind up the EDL sequence
events[].id string

"id" of video segment
events[].startTime number

start time of video segment in seconds
events[].endTime number

end time of video segment in seconds
events[].reelName string

reel name of video segment, generally the name of the card the footage was filmed on or not available
events[].clipName string

file name that the video segment belongs to. Only file name. no path.
Returns:

EDL - and EDL string that can written to file to import EDL into video editing software.

Type
stirng
